sentences.en: A barge was about a hundred yards away, waiting to return seaward.
sentences.cn: 一艘驳船停在大约100码开外，等待着返海回航。

sentences.en: a return fare
sentences.cn: 来回票价

sentences.en: a return ticket
sentences.cn: 来回票

sentences.en: Alison decided to return home.
sentences.cn: 艾利森决定回家。

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: He left his country, never to return.
sentences.cn: 他离开了祖国，一去不复返。

sentences.en: He was still twitchy and we awaited Ann's return anxiously.
sentences.cn: 他仍然焦虑不安，我们担心地等着安回来。

sentences.en: I solemnly vowed that someday I would return to live in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我郑重发誓，总有一天我将回到欧洲生活。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: If I may return to what we were talking about earlier.
sentences.cn: 让我们再回到之前的那个话题。

sentences.en: It was forty five minutes before she returned.
sentences.cn: 过了45分钟她才回来。

sentences.en: Please complete the enclosed application form and return it in the envelope attached.
sentences.cn: 请填好随信所附的申请表并用所附信封寄回。

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
sentences.cn: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

sentences.en: The much repaired plane was crated for the return journey.
sentences.cn: 经过大修的刨子被装入木箱运回去。

sentences.en: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
sentences.cn: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

sentences.en: They cited Alex's refusal to return to the marital home.
sentences.cn: 他们引证了亚历克斯拒绝回到婚后的家中一事。

sentences.en: They just want to return to their families in the occupied territories.
sentences.cn: 他们只是想回到在占领区的家人身边。

sentences.en: Use the enclosed envelope to return your completed survey.
sentences.cn: 请用随信附上的信封将填好的调查表寄回。

sentences.en: Would Bethany return of her own free will, as she had promised?
sentences.cn: 贝萨妮会像她承诺的那样自愿回来吗？

sentences.en: Your job will be kept open for your return after maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 你的工作会一直保留到你休完产假回来。

words.tran_cn: 可归还的；可退回的；可回答的

phrases.tran_cn: 立即回答，立即回复；由下一班邮递带回；由原班回程邮递带回
回报的：作为回报或回复的
(敬祝)长命百岁;万寿无疆(纪念日、生日的贺辞)[亦作I wish you many happy returns of the day.]
（生日祝贺用语）祝你长命百岁
回风，循环空气；回流空气
投资报酬率；投资利润率
(英)（尤用于饭前祷告或回应祝酒或慰问）致谢，感谢

trans.tran_en: used or paid for a journey from one place to another and back again

trans.tran_cn: 回来，归还，重现，收益，报告，回车键，击回球
trans.tran_en: the act of returning from somewhere, or your arrival back in a place

trans.tran_cn: 返回，归还，恢复，重提，回报，回应，回击，宣告，选举，产生
trans.tran_en: to go or come back to a place where you were before

trans.tran_cn: 归还；回报；使回复，使恢复
trans.tran_en: to give or send something back, or to put something back in its place
